name: Doki Doki Schoolhouse!
description:
this is a demo/prototype, it will probably be improved/cancelled later on but i will still be adding updates until i decide, thank you

this is not the end of this game! i just wasnt able to be on ren'py, my files got decrypted, and now its either continuing it after a while, or it will die

oof

note: this is a joke game and it will make you cringe so hard you will want to die so enjoy

what if ddlc was in baldi... but in reverse?!?! BALDI IN DDLC!

a visual novel about what happened after ddlc... A NEW SCHOOL!!! ?????????????????

it's the ultimate combination!

a simple game...

but VERY fun!!!!!

tons of choices that can change the whole story... once choice can give you a good ending... another choice... A BAD ENDING!!!

the jumpscares are very cheap!

so what are you waiting for? PLAY DOKI DOKI SCHOOLHOUSE TODAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!
